description:
Kapusta Deihl & Schweers in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, has proven time and again to return significant compensation to people who have suffered due to mesothelioma, asbestos exposure, car accidents and other personal injury incidents. They also handle estate planning services. The attorneys at this law firm offer complete representation, which means they:

  • Offer free initial consultations
  • Travel to clients to meet with them face to face
  • Are there from start to finish on every case they take
  • Bring more than 40 years of combined experience to the table

Since opening their law firm, the team here has obtained more than $37 million in settlements. They are prepared to take on large corporations that put profit before people and insurance companies that try to deny victims of the money they are owed. Several of the attorneys here have family members who have suffered from the very illnesses involved in their practice areas. They have a personal stake in the battles they fight on behalf of clients today.

As a result of their impeccable service and proven results, these attorneys hold honors that include being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 40 under 40; being listed in the National Academy of Personal Injury Attorneys' Top 10; being named a Super Lawyer; and earning membership into the Million Dollar Advocates Forum. These accolades are a testament to the way the attorneys at this law firm consistently exceed clients' expectations. Kapusta Deihl & Schweers accepts credit cards.
